techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: 'Where tillage begins, other arts follow. The farmers therefore are the founders of human civilization.' - Daniel Webster

techs.name: Scouting
techs.quote: 'The human nature is weak, the influence of its surroundings big.' - Arthur Conan Doyle
uniques: All newly-trained [Scout] units [in all cities] receive the [Ignore terrain cost] promotion

techs.name: Archery
techs.quote: 'The haft of the arrow has been feathered with one of the eagle's own plumes, we often give our enemies the means of our own destruction' - Aesop

techs.name: Irrigation
techs.quote: 'The ultimate goal of farming is not the growing of crops, but the cultivation and perfection of human beings.' - Masanobu Fukuoka

techs.name: Animal Husbandry
techs.quote: 'Thou shalt not muzzle the ox when he treadeth out the corn.' - Bible Deuteronomy 25:4

techs.name: Sailing
techs.quote: 'He who commands the sea has command of everything.' - Themistocles

techs.name: Masonry
uniques: All newly-trained [Worker] units [in all cities] receive the [Can speed up construction of a building] promotion
